page.title: 12SHOPS IN LESBURY & HIPSBURN.
page.content: The shops in and around the area of Lesbury and Hipsburn are very few. In fact there are only two. One is a post office as well as a shop and the other is a general purpose shop. We asked some people in the area what they thought of the two shops. One lady said,"There aren't enough shops in the area, it costs too much and there isn't a big enough variety."So she would go and do her shopping in a supermarket where the prices were lower. Then we asked an old man who said,"There are enough shops but not enough variety." So he, like the other woman has to go to Alnwick to shop.Some people said that they would like a chemist or a butcher's shop in the area.Alnwick is the nearest town to Lesbury and Hipsburn.
